statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficData;
SELECT ID, Date, Location, Speed FROM TrafficData WHERE Speed > 50;
SELECT ID, Date, Time FROM TrafficData WHERE Date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE CongestionLevel = 'High' ORDER BY Speed DESC;
SELECT Location, Speed, CongestionLevel FROM TrafficData WHERE Location LIKE 'City%' ORDER BY Date ASC, Time ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE Speed > 50 ORDER BY Date DESC, Time ASC
SELECT ID, Location FROM TrafficData WHERE CongestionLevel = 'High' ORDER BY Speed ASC
SELECT Date, Time, Location FROM TrafficData WHERE Speed BETWEEN 40 AND 60 AND CongestionLevel = 'Low'
SELECT ID, Location, CongestionLevel FROM TrafficData WHERE Date = '2022-10-15' AND Speed < 40
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE Location LIKE 'City%'
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data;
SELECT start_location, end_location, traffic_volume FROM historical_traffic_data ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT route_id, congestion_pattern FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE congestion_pattern = 'Heavy';
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE traffic_volume >= 1000;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, estimated_travel_time FROM historical_traffic_data JOIN route_planning_data ON historical_traffic_data.route_id = route_planning_data.route_id;
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE congestion_pattern = 'Heavy Traffic' ORDER BY start_location ASC
SELECT route_id, planned_route, estimated_travel_time FROM route_planning_data WHERE estimated_travel_time < 60 ORDER BY route_id
SELECT start_location, end_location, traffic_volume FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE congestion_pattern = 'Moderate Traffic' ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC

SELECT start_location, end_location, traffic_volume, congestion_pattern FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE traffic_volume BETWEEN 50 AND 150 AND congestion_pattern = 'Light Traffic' ORDER BY end_location
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data;
SELECT route_id, date, time, traffic_volume FROM historical_traffic_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM route_planning WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT route_id, congestion_level, cause FROM congestion_patterns WHERE congestion_level = 'High';
SELECT route_id, timestamp, cause FROM congestion_patterns ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, MAX(traffic_volume) AS max_traffic_volume FROM historical_traffic_data GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT route_id, date, time, traffic_volume, traffic_speed FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE traffic_speed > 60 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM route_planning WHERE distance > 50 AND road_condition = 'Good' ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT route_id, congestion_level, cause, timestamp FROM congestion_patterns WHERE cause LIKE '%accident%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT date, time, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM route_planning WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT location, congestion_level, peak_hours FROM congestion_patterns WHERE congestion_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE road_condition = 'Wet' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_type, speed, location FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, duration FROM route_planning WHERE distance BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT COUNT(id) as total_count, location FROM congestion_patterns GROUP BY location HAVING total_count > 5 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT date, traffic_volume, road_condition FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT route_id, traffic_volume FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM route_mapping WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT congestion_id, congestion_level FROM congestion_patterns ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT date, time, temperature, rain_intensity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND rain_intensity > 0;
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data ORDER BY route_id DESC, date ASC, traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT route_id, date, traffic_volume FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE route_id = 123 AND traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT congestion_id, date, congestion_level FROM congestion_patterns WHERE congestion_level >= 3 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT start_location, end_location, recommended_speed FROM route_planning WHERE recommended_speed > 60 ORDER BY recommended_speed DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(rain_intensity) FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 20 AND rain_intensity > 0;
